Start of sample (depth in m); 998 is Method Blank, 999 is Bottle Blank
End of sample (only if code indicates the sample is depth-integrated; depth in m)
Less than flag
0 - original sample; Sequence 1 - replicate 1; Sequence 2 - replicate 2, etc.
